mapper.select: select u.* , s.last_message lastMessage,s.last_receive_time lastReceiveTime , case when SUBSTRING(u.contact_id,1,1) = 'G' then (select count(1) from user_contact uc where uc.contact_id = u.contact_id) else 0 end memberCount from chat_session_user u inner join chat_session s on u.session_id = s.session_id where u.user_id = #{userId} order by s.last_receive_time desc
